amendatorysection.para: All drugs and substances or immediate precursors listed in section 28-405 are hereby declared to be controlled substances, whether listed by official name, generic, common, or usual name, chemical name, brand, or trade name.

annotation.para: Under this section and section 28-405(c)(10) and (c)(15), marijuana is a Schedule I controlled substance, and thus is a "drug." State v. Finnegan, 232 Neb. 75, 439 N.W.2d 496 (1989).
